00149 void usb_task_init(void)
00150 {
00151    #if (USE_USB_PADS_REGULATOR==ENABLE)  // Otherwise assume USB PADs regulator is not used
00152    Usb_enable_regulator();
00153    #endif
00154    usb_device_task_init();
00155 #if (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP == ENABLED)
00156    usb_remote_wup_feature = DISABLED;
00157 #endif
00158 }
00159 
00169 void usb_task(void)
00170 {
00171    usb_device_task();
00172 }
00173 
00192 #ifdef __GNUC__
00193  ISR(USB_GEN_vect)
00194 #else
00195 #pragma vector = USB_General_vect
00196 __interrupt void usb_general_interrupt()
00197 #endif
00198 {
00199   //- VBUS state detection
00200    if (Is_usb_vbus_transition() && Is_usb_vbus_interrupt_enabled())
00201    {
00202       Usb_ack_vbus_transition();
00203       if (Is_usb_vbus_high())
00204       {
00205          usb_connected = TRUE;
00206          Usb_vbus_on_action();
00207          Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_POWERED);
00208          Usb_enable_reset_interrupt();
00209          usb_start_device();
00210          Usb_attach();
00211       }
00212       else
00213       {
00214          Usb_vbus_off_action();
00215          usb_connected = FALSE;
00216          usb_configuration_nb = 0;
00217          Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_UNPOWERED);
00218       }
00219    }
00220   // - Device start of frame received
00221    if (Is_usb_sof() && Is_sof_interrupt_enabled())
00222    {
00223       Usb_ack_sof();
00224       Usb_sof_action();
00225    }
00226   // - Device Suspend event (no more USB activity detected)
00227    if (Is_usb_suspend() && Is_suspend_interrupt_enabled())
00228    {
00229       usb_suspended=TRUE;
00230       Usb_ack_wake_up();                 // clear wake up to detect next event
00231       Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_SUSPEND);
00232       Usb_ack_suspend();
00233       Usb_enable_wake_up_interrupt();
00234       Usb_disable_resume_interrupt();
00235       Usb_freeze_clock();
00236       Stop_pll();
00237       Usb_suspend_action();
00238    }
00239   // - Wake up event (USB activity detected): Used to resume
00240    if (Is_usb_wake_up() && Is_wake_up_interrupt_enabled())
00241    {
00242       if(Is_pll_ready()==FALSE)
00243       {
00244          #ifdef USE_USB_AUTOBAUD
00245             usb_autobaud();
00246          #else
00247             Pll_start_auto();
00248          #endif
00249          Wait_pll_ready();
00250       }
00251       Usb_unfreeze_clock();
00252       Usb_ack_wake_up();
00253       if(usb_suspended)
00254       {
00255          Usb_enable_resume_interrupt();
00256          Usb_enable_reset_interrupt();
00257          Usb_ack_wake_up();
00258          Usb_disable_wake_up_interrupt();
00259          Usb_wake_up_action();
00260          Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_WAKE_UP);
00261          Usb_enable_suspend_interrupt();
00262          Usb_enable_resume_interrupt();
00263          Usb_enable_reset_interrupt();
00264 
00265       }
00266    }
00267   // - Resume state bus detection
00268    if (Is_usb_resume() && Is_resume_interrupt_enabled())
00269    {
00270       usb_suspended = FALSE;
00271       Usb_disable_wake_up_interrupt();
00272       Usb_ack_resume();
00273       Usb_disable_resume_interrupt();
00274       Usb_resume_action();
00275       Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_RESUME);
00276    }
00277   // - USB bus reset detection
00278    if (Is_usb_reset()&& Is_reset_interrupt_enabled())
00279    {
00280       #if (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP == ENABLED)
00281       usb_remote_wup_feature = DISABLED;
00282       #endif
00283       Usb_ack_reset();
00284       usb_init_device();
00285       Usb_reset_action();
00286       Usb_send_event(EVT_USB_RESET);
00287    }
00288 
00289 }
